title: WTB Baum Obak Cabinet, Baum Zeenut
author: Spider's Kin

posts.post_title: WTB Baum Obak Cabinet, Baum Zeenut
posts.post_content: Spider Baum was my great-grandfather. Looking to purchase cards of him for a family collection. Interested in an Obak Cabinet card and any Zeenut cards from 1913-1920.
